forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a mixture of light rain and snow developing late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low -4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 27F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low around 30F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
